PropertyBag.Description: Metering of session of this service is scheduled to run every x hours. If paymentservicetransactionid property is not metered in (default behaviour), then all the transactions in prenote, ach_credit and ach_debit product view ares picked up to be validated for processing, if it is metered in then record with this paymentservicetransactionid is tried to be found.
PropertyBag.Name: ps_retrievetransactionstatus

Property.Description: This is the transaction identifier assigned by the payment service. The payment service uses this identifier to uniquely identify a transaction.
Property.Name: paymentservicetransactionid
